cats.name: Bigby
cats.bio: He is a good boi, although often times he enjoys being by himself, but he'll come to around for the occasional snuggle. (He is also very fuzzy)

cats.name: Nezbitte
cats.bio: He is very Chonky and very lazy. He is the model lapcat, and can often be seen staring off at the corner of the room with an empty gaze.

cats.name: Maggie
cats.bio: Maggie is an Anxious sweet-heart, when she isn't busy fearing for her life she will allow you to pet her.

cats.name: Mowglie
cats.bio: Playful and unrelenting, for this little guy playtime is all the time. With a seemingly endless battery Mowglie will make sure you're always on your toes.

cats.name: Dimi
cats.bio: Despite being so young, Dimi is very sociable. He is mildly playful and always has time for sleeping and eating, he's a growing boy ya know!

dogs.name: Cupcake
dogs.bio: Relaxed, and good with families. Has a beautiful white coat.

dogs.name: Coco
dogs.bio: Energetic, and good with families. has a gorgeous black coat.

dogs.name: Sarge
dogs.bio: An old and sweet dog. On most days you'll find him wearing a sweater going for walks.

dogs.name: Cooper
dogs.bio: Has the sweetest face you could ever know and a personality to match, but does not do well with kids.

dogs.name: Rusty
dogs.bio: Old doge that enjoys laying down all day, this one would likely be best suited for an elderly couple.
